description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

When triggered, this enhanced flechette cannon ammunition fires a volley of energy flechette rounds in a short line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a long line 45 feet long and 5 feet wide. A single flechette mag holds enough ammunition for three attacks in a short line or one attack in a long line. Each creature must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[/r 6d10]] energy damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.

Â 

Flechette mag, plasma

When triggered, this flechette cannon ammunition fires a volley of energy flechette rounds in a short line 15 feet long and 5 feet wide or a long line 45 feet long and 5 feet wide. A single flechette mag holds enough ammunition for three attacks in a short line or one attack in a long line. Each creature must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes [[/r 2d10]] energy damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one.
